mapper.insert: insert into board (no, bno, title, bookname, regdate, type, writer) values(#{no},#{bno},#{title}, #{bookname}, sysdate, #{type}, #{writer})
mapper.select: select no, title, writer, regdate, viewcnt from board where no = #{no}
select board_seq.nextval as no from dual
mapper.update: update board set title =#{title} where no = #{no}
mapper.select: select * from board order by good asc
select no, title, writer, regdate, viewcnt from board where no > 0 order by no desc, regdate desc
select no, title, writer, regdate, viewcnt from board where no > 0 order by no desc, regdate desc limit #{page}, 10
select no, title, writer, regdate, viewcnt from (select board.*, row_number() over (order by regdate desc,no desc) as row_id from board) where row_id between #{pageStart} and #{perPageNum}
select count(no) from board where no > 0
select * from board where writer =#{writer} order by (regdate) asc
select * from board where writer=#{id} order by red desc
mapper.update: update board set red='Y' where no=#{no}
